name: Primordial (itch)
description:
What happens when a creation is artificial? A creation that can jump freely, eats and punches what it wants to.  Discover what the world and it's maker can provide!

Controls:

Primordial is made to be compatible with xbox controllers while it also supports keyboard and mouse. 

In the description below the controls for the controller are mentioned first and PC controls second.

 
Left thumbstick  / WASD  - Move

X button  / Left mouse button  - Punch

A button / Space - Jump

B Button / Esc - Skip Cutscene

Start / Esc - Pause game

Credits:

Art, Sound & Animation:

Maarten Jansen

Development:

Edwin Dierssen

End Sketch inspired by:

Louis C.K.

This was our first time making a game. Any feedback is welcome!

The last cutscene reveals the anomaly, which has to do with the world your character lives in.

Due to a not-yet found bug, the game is downloadable as "Debug" version. It is however very much playable! Just ignore the command line ;)

Made using the Godot Engine.
